long_description: The extra-long Deuter Futura Pro 44 EL Pack offers tall hikers top-notch ventilation, weight transfer and a comfortable pivoting hipbelt that molds itself to your shape. Contoured, padded shoulder straps for all-day comfort. VariFlex pivoting hipbelt follows your body's movements and helps you keep your balance on difficult terrain. AIRCOMFORT Pro ventilated back system helps reduce perspiration by up to 25%; spring steel wire design combined with a horizontal stay provides superb load transfer. Separate bottom compartment with removable separator. Lid compartment and valuables pocket; zippered hipbelt pocket; bellowed and stretch side pockets; lid attachment loops; side compression straps; trekking pole loops. The Deuter Futura Pro 44 EL Pack features an integrated, detachable rain cover and an SOS label with instructions for emergencies.
short_description: The extra-long Deuter Futura Pro 44 EL Pack offers tall hikers top-notch ventilation, weight transfer and a comfortable pivoting hipbelt that molds itself to your shape.
